other_tests.findings: Sinus rhythm with a ventricular rate of 101 beats per minute, a PR interval of 260 msec, a QRS complex of 136 msec, first-degree atrioventricular block and right bundle-branch block.
other_tests.changes_over_time: First-degree atrioventricular block and right bundle-branch block were present and had not been present 3 years earlier.

other_tests.findings: High-grade tear of the left common hamstring tendon at the ischial tuberosity attachment site.
Nonspecific abnormal uptake by the rib lesion and at the left ischium.
